cause.description:
The Triangle Foundation (formerly the Collin Equality Foundation) provides educational and enriching opportunities to individuals, families and groups in order to establish partnerships and to foster alliances equally throughout society, regardless of one's sexual orientation and/or gender identity, that work toward a more powerful, secure and productive humanity free of discrimination.
The Triangle Foundation is operated as a 501(c)(3) non-profit corporation chartered under the laws of the State of Texas. The Foundation is the first and oldest organization of its kind in North Texas.
1. Reduce discrimination based on sexual orientation and gender identity
2. Educate individuals, familes and groups on equality issues
cause.name: The Triangle Foundation
